name: uneatable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not suitable or good enough to eat: She did not tell me about the cold, or the unkind teachers or that the food was often burnt and uneatable. We all complained bitterly about the uneatable breakfast. Synonym
inedible
More examplesFewer examplesThe steak was covered in peppercorns to the point of almost being uneatable.The paper part of the onions is uneatable, so you want to make sure you get rid of all that.Oversalting will make the crackling uneatable.
